ProjectTitle: Dupuytren under the microsope. A Dupuytren research battery as an integrated approach to save hands.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
04/08/2022
This is not the Data Management Plan that FWO expects. These are just the 5 data questions that you answer in the proposal; At this stage of the project you need to develop a full DMP using the FWO template. This can be done using dmponline KU Leuven or a Word template. Further information and template here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp
